casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Marlon E. MENDOZA-MEJIA. No. 420P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 21, 2015. Andrew DeSimone, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Mendoza-Mejia, Marlon E. John F. Oates, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of December 2015 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of December 2015."
